sqlList.sql: select t.id,t.fog_order_num,TO_CHAR(t.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS create_time,TO_CHAR(t.in_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS in_date, t.VENDOR from t_lm_order t where (:ORDEID IS NULL OR t.id > :ORDEID) AND fog_order_num IS NOT NULL and (t.VENDOR IS NULL OR t.VENDOR <> 'ELONG') and t.price_code='LMBAR2' order by t.id asc
select max(t.order_id) AS MAXID from t_lm_order_cof t order by t.order_id desc

merge into T_LM_ORDER_COF t1 using (select :ORDERID AS ORDER_ID,:FOGORDERNUM AS FOG_ORDER_NUM,:OPEUSER AS CREATE_USER, :CREATIME AS ORDER_CREATE_TIME, :INDATE AS IN_DATE, :VENDOR AS VENDOR from dual) t2 on (t1.order_id= t2.ORDER_ID and (t1.FOG_ORDER_NUM IS NULL OR t1.FOG_ORDER_NUM = t2.FOG_ORDER_NUM)) when not matched then insert values (T_LM_ORDER_COF_SEQ.nextval,t2.ORDER_ID, t2.FOG_ORDER_NUM,'0', t2.CREATE_USER,'','','','0',null,'0',null,'0',sysdate,t2.CREATE_USER,sysdate,t2.CREATE_USER,'',TO_DATE(t2.ORDER_CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),TO_DATE(t2.IN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'0', t2.VENDOR)

select distinct tro.hotel_id AS Hotel_ID, bp.prop_name_zh AS Hotel_Name, tro.room_code AS Room_Code, tro.room_name AS Room_Name, bp.cityid AS City_ID, sur.sup_hotel_id AS Mapping_Hotel, sur.sup_room_id AS Mapping_Room, sur.source AS MPType, '' AS ROOMBED from t_room tro inner join t_sup_map_room sur on tro.hotel_id = sur.app_hotel_id and tro.room_code = sur.app_room_id and sur.source='ELONG' inner join t_lm_b_prop bp on tro.hotel_id=bp.prop

select count(distinct tro.hotel_id) AS Hotel_ID, count(tro.room_code) AS Room_Code from (select distinct trm.hotel_id, trm.room_code from t_room trm inner join t_price_code_room pcr on trm.hotel_id = pcr.hotel_id and pcr.room_code=trm.room_code and pcr.status='1' and pcr.price_code IN ('LMBAR','LMBAR2')) tro inner join t_lm_b_prop bp on tro.hotel_id=bp.prop inner join t_lm_plan lp on lp.hotel_id = bp.prop and lp.room_type_code=tro.room_code and lp.effect_date=trunc(sysdate, 'dd')
update T_ROOM set ROOM_AREA=:ROOMAREA, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate, UPDATE_USER=:UPDATEUSER where HOTEL_ID=:HOTELID and ROOM_CODE=:ROOMCODE
